conversion_verification.notes: The asset is a legitimate 3D isometric cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall thickness and volume. Minor perspective compression.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major geometric failure. The 3D model does not follow the large L-shaped/multi-wing layout of the 2D plan. The 2D plan features a Master Suite, Theater, and Garage which are entirely missing or irreconcilable with the small square unit rendered.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is present but does not correlate with the specific room functions (e.g., Garage, Laundry, WIR) shown in the 2D architectural drawing.

visual_clarity.notes: The render itself is clean and high quality, but loses points for not representing the source structure.

detected_errors.description: The 3D model features a completely different floor plan layout than the 2D source image provided. More than 50% of the specific architectural zones (Garage, Alfresco, Master Suite) are absent.
Room proportions and adjacency do not match the long, narrow corridor-based layout of the floor plan.

summary: While technically a high-quality 3D isometric render, the model fails to represent the actual geometry and layout of the provided 2D architectural floor plan.
